name: Happiny
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: It likes to carry around a small rock. It may wander around others’ feet and cause them to stumble.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Chansey from your hand onto Happiny (this counts as evolving Happiny) and remove all damage counters from Happiny.

attacks.name: Hospitality
attacks.effect: Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. Remove 2 damage counters from the new Defending Pokémon.
